overview:
Vijay joins the FuGen Solutions with over 15 years of experience in Silicon Valley most recently coming from Hewlett-Packard (HP). While at HP, Vijay played a key role in helping HP break into the Identity & Access Management software business.

Prior to HP, Vijay spent over 6 years at Oblix (acquired by Oracle) holding a variety of senior level positions in the delivery and implementation team. As part of the Oblix delivery team, Vijay was responsible for the successful customer deployments of Oblix products at several Fortune 100 customers across the horizontal industry segments. His customers have included Ford, British Airways, AT&T Wireless, GMAC, Kaiser-Permanente, Best-Buys, Boeing, WaMu, GM, and others.
